description: This file defines a utility class for date formatting within a Flutter or Dart project, specifically for formatting timestamps for list and editor metadata display.

classes.name: AppDateFormat
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods and properties for formatting DateTime objects into human-readable strings for UI display.

methods.name: formatList
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a string like 'Mar 3, 2025 • 14:30' for list or detail UI presentation.
